questions.question: What is the dominant color of the cosmetic product's visible surface?
What is the overall shape of the cosmetic product container?
What appears to be the texture of the cosmetic product itself?
What material seems to constitute the body of the cosmetic applicator?
What is the apparent finish of the cosmetic product's color?
What is the visible design element near the bottom of the product?
What seems to be the consistency suggested by the product's description?
What form does the cosmetic product take for application?
Does the product's image show any noticeable markings on its packaging?
What color is the metallic portion of the product's packaging?
What is the shape of the cosmetic product's application tip?
Does the product packaging display any brand naming?
Considering the image, is the product opaque or translucent?
Based on visual cues, does the product appear creamy or waxy?
What kind of finish does the product seem to provide, based on its appearance?
